stories.text:
In light of today's high CPI print in the USA and soaring producer prices [1] around the world, in 1990 Brazil reached an annualized interest rate of 790,799% [2]. Unfortunately, HN reroutes the businessinsider link to a different page, so I was forced to post it as a text post.

[1] https://tradingeconomics.com/forecast/producer-prices-change

[2] https://www.businessinsider.com/brazil-historys-highest-interest-rates-2014-2
stories.title: In 1990, Brazilian Interest Rates Hit 790,799%
Cubic Bézier: From Math to Motion
This year, I changed my mind about nuclear, hydro power and vegan food

stories.text:
I just confirmed what seems to be a legitimate email. Coinbase is requiring all my info - including social security number, or the account with all my funds will be suspended. Note that other exchanges do not require this.

This was not accordingly to the Terms I agreed upon when signed up with Coinbase. I felt cheated! The whole mission of Coinbase was to make the world smaller because of anonymous and unregulated ways the cryptocurrencies thrive. Now moving forward when Brian (the owner, who changed his mission many times from charging zero fees to charging over 5% per transaction) is requiring all this info or I lose my money.

This is scam and clear case of providing dishonest services.
stories.title: Tell HN: Coinbase to require all my info by June '22, or account suspended
